name: Burak Bahar's Unseen Anchor
description: It’s 2013… Holy “Siege” banner of The Chief Soldier has been moved to eternal world to welcome soldiers of future in ascendant future. Delivered his last masterpiece, named after him, perfectly on the day he died, and this perfection brought immortality.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, and 10 are all supported. Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows XP is not supported.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, and 10 are all supported. Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows XP is not supported.
